GSD.description: The Wide Area Application Services (WAAS) Express implementation in Cisco IOS 15.1 through 15.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (device reload) via a crafted TCP segment, aka Bug ID CSCuq59708.

description_data.value: The Wide Area Application Services (WAAS) Express implementation in Cisco IOS 15.1 through 15.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (device reload) via a crafted TCP segment, aka Bug ID CSCuq59708.

reference_data.name: 20160323 Cisco IOS Software Wide Area Application Services Express Denial of Service Vulnerability
